amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the citizen enforcement section of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 111-327 to strike the citizen enforcement section of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCaul amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 232 (Roll no. 873).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. McCaul.
